*R/data.R*

## flourish_api_documentation

## Description
 A data set containing template metadata about Flourish graphs 

## Format

 A data frame with 57 rows and 5 variables:  

template_group

Template grouping - maps, line-bar-pie, etc.

 

template_id

Template ID. Found in API documentation: 

 

template_version

Template version number. Found in API documentation: 

 

chart_type

Chart type. One template may have multiple chart types.

 

URL

URL for template API documentation.

  

## Usage
```r
 
flourish_api_documentation 
```
